question_text: Person 1: Well , I ’ d better get back to work . I ’ Ve got a ton of stuff on my desk !
Person 2: Me too . I ’ ll see you after work , huh ?
Person 1: Yeah , definitely . I was hoping to catch a ride with you .
Person 2: Sure . Meet me at five .
Person 1: Lets invite Bobbie and John to our party , OK ?
Person 2: You can never do that .
Person 2: Theres been bad blood between them since Bobbie took away Johns girlfriend .
